# Test for endless generators, i.e. infinite recursion in gg

# first run
go list ./...
! gg -p 1 -trace ./...
! stdout .+
stderr '\Qhit max number of iterations (10) for mod.com/p1\E'

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

-- p1/p1.go --
package p1

//go:generate gobin -m -run mod.com/gen

-- gen/gen.go --
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"io/ioutil"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	now := []byte(fmt.Sprintf("%v\n", time.Now()))
	if err := ioutil.WriteFile("gen_p1_gen.txt", now, 0666); err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}
}
